adHeader: SMALL GENERAL BUILDING CONTRACTOR NEEDS WORK
adDetails: I can help you repair your structural , roofing, interior, electrical, and plumbing problems at the lowest possible cost to you. You can buy those materials direct from outlets such as Home Depot, or others at my direction or I can buy them for your account. I can give you a fixed price labor quote, and material estimate for my work. I AM A BONDED LICENSED GENERAL BUILDING CONTRACTOR. CALL MIKE AT show contact info
